languages.text: "Мы называем это Осколоком. И — да, я прибыл сюда ради него, как вы верно подметили. В этом устройстве заключена древняя... скорее додревняя сущность космической мощи. К'тан, так их звали. Сейчас чудовище рвется на свободу, и я пришел, чтобы надеть на него ошейник". {n}Калькасар кивает на огромное устройство, явно принесенное в крипту извне.{/n}

"We call it a Shard. And yes, as you have noted quite aptly, it is the reason I am here. This construct contains an ancient, or rather, a pre-ancient being of cosmic power. They were called the C'tan. The entity is currently trying to escape, and I am here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, whose design clearly points to it having been brought into the crypt from outside.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы называем это Осколоком. И — да, я прибыл сюда ради него, как вы верно подметили. В этом устройстве заключена древняя... скорее додревняя сущность космической мощи. К'тан, так их звали. Сейчас чудовище рвется на свободу, и я пришел, чтобы надеть на него ошейник". {n}Калькасар кивает на огромное устройство, явно принесенное в крипту извне.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We call this Shard. And yes, as you correctly noted, I have come here for it. This device contains an ancient... or, rather, a pre-ancient essence of cosmic power. They were called C'Tan. The monster is now trying to escape, and I am here to put a collar on it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, obviously carried into the crypt from the outside.{/n}

The monster is now trying to escape, and I am here to put a collar on it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, obviously carried into the crypt from the outside.{/n}

The monster is now trying to escape, and I'm here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device that has obviously been carried into the crypt from the outside.{/n}

The monster is now trying to escape, and I'm here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device that has obviously been carried into the crypt from the outside.{/n}

They were called the C'tan. The entity is currently trying to escape, and I am here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, whose design clearly points to it having been brought into the crypt from outside.{/n}

They were called the C'tan. The entity is currently trying to escape, and I am here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, whose design clearly points to it having been brought into the crypt from outside.{/n}

languages.text: « Nous appelons cela une Écharde. Et oui, comme vous l'avez très justement remarqué, c'est la raison de ma présence ici. Cet appareil contient une essence de pouvoir cosmique antique... ou plutôt pré-antique. On l'appelait le C'tan. Cette entité tente maintenant de s'échapper, mais je suis là pour la soumettre. » {n}Calcazar désigne d'un signe de tête le gigantesque appareil, dont l'aspect indique clairement qu'il vient d'ailleurs et a été apporté dans la crypte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call it a Shard. And yes, as you have noted quite aptly, it is the reason I am here. This construct contains an ancient, or rather, a pre-ancient being of cosmic power. They were called the C'tan. The entity is currently trying to escape, and I am here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, whose design clearly points to it having been brought into the crypt from outside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous appelons cela l'Écharde. Et oui, comme vous l'avez très justement remarqué, c'est la raison de ma présence ici. Cet appareil contient une essence de pouvoir cosmique antique... ou plutôt pré-antique. On l'appelait le C'tan. Ce monstre tente maintenant de s'échapper, mais je suis là pour le soumettre. » {n}Calcazar désigne d'un signe de tête l'immense appareil qui a manifestement été apporté dans la crypte.{/n}

languages.text: «Lo llamamos fragmento. Y sí, como ya ha supuesto, es el motivo por el que estoy aquí. Esta estructura contiene una antigua... no, preantigua entidad de poder cósmico. Se conocía como C'tan. Este ser está intentando escapar, y yo estoy aquí para ponerle un collar». {n}Calcazar señala con la cabeza al gigantesco dispositivo, cuyo diseño hace evidente que se ha transportado a la cripta desde fuera.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call it a Shard. And yes, as you have noted quite aptly, it is the reason I am here. This construct contains an ancient, or rather, a pre-ancient being of cosmic power. They were called the C'tan. The entity is currently trying to escape, and I am here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, whose design clearly points to it having been brought into the crypt from outside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esto es lo que llamamos el fragmento. Y, sí, como bien ha señalado, he venido a por él. Este dispositivo contiene una antigua... mejor dicho, preantigua esencia de poder cósmico. Se lo conocía como C'Tan. El monstruo está intentando escapar y yo he venido a ponerle una correa». {n}Calcazar hace un gesto de cabeza hacia el dispositivo gigantesco que han introducido claramente en la cripta.{/n}

languages.text: “我们称它为‘碎片’。没错，如你所言，我就是来寻找它的。这个装置中蕴含着某种古老……或者更确切地说，是某种先古时期的宇宙实体。这种实体被称之为‘星神’，它正打算逃跑，而我是来驯服它的。”{n}卡尔卡扎朝这台巨大的装置点了点头。很显然，这台装置是从外面带到这座墓穴里的。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call it a Shard. And yes, as you have noted quite aptly, it is the reason I am here. This construct contains an ancient, or rather, a pre-ancient being of cosmic power. They were called the C'tan. The entity is currently trying to escape, and I am here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, whose design clearly points to it having been brought into the crypt from outside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们称它为‘碎片’。没错，如你所言，我就是来寻找它的。这个装置里蕴含着某种古老……或者更确切地说，是先古时期宇宙力量的精华。这种精华被称之为‘星神’。这只怪物打算逃跑，而我是来抓它的。”{n}卡尔卡扎朝这台巨大的装置点了点头。很显然，这台装置是从外面带到这座墓穴里的。{/n}

languages.text: "Wir nennen es ein Fragment. Manchmal auch Splitter. Und ja, wie Ihr treffend angemerkt habt, ist es der Grund für meine Anwesenheit. Dieses Konstrukt enthält ein uraltes, nein, ein vorzeitliches Wesen kosmischer Macht. Man nannte es C'tan. Das Wesen versucht gerade, zu entkommen, und ich bin hier, um es festzusetzen." {n}Calcazar nickt in Richtung des riesigen Geräts, dessen Aussehen eindeutig darauf hinweist, dass es von außerhalb in die Krypta gebracht wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call it a Shard. And yes, as you have noted quite aptly, it is the reason I am here. This construct contains an ancient, or rather, a pre-ancient being of cosmic power. They were called the C'tan. The entity is currently trying to escape, and I am here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, whose design clearly points to it having been brought into the crypt from outside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir nennen das ein Fragment. Und ja, wie Ihr richtig bemerkt habt, bin ich deswegen gekommen. Dieses Gerät enthält eine antike ... oder besser gesagt eine prä-antike Essenz der kosmischen Macht. Man nannte sie die C'tan. Das Monster versucht nun zu entkommen, und ich bin hier, um ihm ein Halsband anzulegen." {n}Calcazar nickt in Richtung des riesigen Geräts, das offensichtlich von außen in die Krypta geschafft wurde.{/n}

languages.text: 「我々は、これをシャードと呼んでいる。そして、そうだ、あなたの指摘通り、私はこれを求めてここに来た。この装置には古代の…いや、古代以前の宇宙の存在の力が含まれている。彼らはク＝タンと呼ばれていた。その怪物は今逃げ出そうとしているため、私はそれを鎖にかけに来たのだ」{n}その設計から明らかに、それが外から墓所に運び込まれた巨大な装置を見て、カルカサルがうなずく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We call it a Shard. And yes, as you have noted quite aptly, it is the reason I am here. This construct contains an ancient, or rather, a pre-ancient being of cosmic power. They were called the C'tan. The entity is currently trying to escape, and I am here to collar it." {n}Calcazar nods at the giant device, whose design clearly points to it having been brought into the crypt from outside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々はこれをシャードと呼んでいる。そうだ、あなたの指摘通り、私はこれを求めてここに来た。この装置には古代の…いや、古代以前の宇宙の力のエッセンスが含まれている。彼らはク＝タンと呼ばれていた。その怪物は今逃げ出そうとしている。そして、私はそれをつなぎとめるためにここに来たのだ」{n}明らかに外から地下室に運び込まれた巨大な装置を見て、カルカサルがうなずく。{/n}
